name: Spot The Penguin
description:
Welcome to the forest! Shine your flashlight at the penguin to make it go away (and to gain points). Use your points to buy items at the shop. Make sure to avoid shining your light at the walrus, or he'll get mad, and ignore the fish. Have fun!

Background music is "Don't Go Inside" by WombatNoisesAudio

https://www.free-stock-music.com/wombat-noises-audio-dont-go-inside.html
